item.title: Scraping data from the local elections
item.description: One of my journalist friend was looking at the result of the local election in Luxembourg and he was dissatisfied because he was unable to compare the results of all the communes. In fact, he wanted to compare the number of women that were candidates in each commune. So I asked him to hold on and I came back one hour later with this script that enables him to collect results of all communes in one table.
